Intro: At Kingsdown, we understand passion. It describes how we feel about delivering smarter sleep for our customers. Kingsdown Passions mattress collection is the realization of that passion in a gel sleep collection that makes smarter sleep available for everyone. Title: n/a
Intro: All the comforts of an adjustable base and then some. Whether you're looking to sit up while you read or to feel the relaxing effects of the "zero gravity" position, this adjustable base collection can do it all. With the touch of a button you can position the back rest as high as 62° and adjust the leg position up to 46°. If you find a position you like you can save it in one of the five "memory slots" so you can simply return to the same position later on. The one touch "flat" button returns the bed to its normal position with just one press on the controls. When its time to really relax, take advantage of the dual massage function of the base. If you have to get up for any reason in the middle of the night there is also an under the bed light that will help guide the way.

Title: n/a
